comments.body: I was wondering if there was a way to do this without having to implement a stub for EVERY property in the Request/Response object. Learned something new, thanks!

I don't know if this is the proper way either. Now typings "thinks" there is eg. cookies property in that mock, when there is no such property. Thankfully the cookies is any, but there are also other properties which are not included in that mock. I think you know what I want to say ðŸ˜Š
